mapper.select: select DOWNCOUPON.dcouid, to_char(COUPON.period_f,'YYYY/MM/dd') period_f, to_char(COUPON.period_t,'YYYY/MM/dd') period_t, BISUSER.BISNAME, DOWNCOUPON.use_yn, DOWNCOUPON.userid, COUPON.content from DOWNCOUPON , COUPON , BISUSER where DOWNCOUPON.COUID = COUPON.COUID and COUPON.BISID = BISUSER.BISID and userid = #{userid}

select COUPON.CLICKCOUNT CLICKCOUNT, BISUSER.BISNAME BISNAME, COUPON.CONTENT CONTENT, COUPON.PERIOD_F PERIOD_F, COUPON.PERIOD_T PERIOD_T, COUPON.COUID COUID from COUPON, BISUSER WHERE COUPON.BISID = BISUSER.BISID order by COUPON.CLICKCOUNT desc

select COUPON.CLICKCOUNT CLICKCOUNT, BISUSER.BISNAME BISNAME, COUPON.CONTENT CONTENT, COUPON.PERIOD_F PERIOD_F, COUPON.PERIOD_T PERIOD_T, COUPON.COUID COUID from COUPON, BISUSER WHERE COUPON.BISID = BISUSER.BISID and COUPON.BISID = (select BISUSER.BISID from BISUSER where BISUSER.ADDR1 like #{searchName}||'%') order by COUPON.CLICKCOUNT desc
